activities:
Syntel being a Global organization engages in dealing with information related to its customers and employees across various countries, some of these information’s can be of personal nature. Most of our projects in EU are executed at our client location using our client’s infrastructure. Syntel in the capacity of data processor undertakes the processing of its customers data, as per the instructions or as per agreed terms with its clients. 
We have reasonable employee strength in EU and the personal information of our EU employee’s are being managed centrally as well as locally for administrative reasons. The personal information of our employees is mostly used for compensation related processing. Our EU employee information is also used for other benefits provided to our resource’s which also covers insurance.
